name: Acute Lower Back Strain
chief_complaint: I have a sharp pain in my lower back that started after lifting heavy boxes yesterday.
physical_findings: tenderness on palpation of lumbar paraspinal muscles
reduced range of motion in lumbar spine
prognosis: Excellent with proper self-care; typically resolves within 2-4 weeks
description: A common musculoskeletal injury caused by overstretching or tearing of muscles/tendons in the lower back, often due to improper lifting or sudden movements.
